title: Episode 181: Time to Cry with Danielle Henderson
itunes:title: Episode 181: Time to Cry with Danielle Henderson
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree welcome back Danielle Henderson to chat about her new book The Ugly Cry, why she bought a farm and is renovating it herself, and her philosophy on trying new things at any age.  - To leave a voicemail or text for a future epi...
description:
Kate and Doree welcome back Danielle Henderson to chat about her new book The Ugly Cry, why she bought a farm and is renovating it herself, and her philosophy on trying new things at any age. 


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.
  • Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
